titleStmt.title: A proclamation against those that doeth innouate, alter or leaue doune any rite or ceremonie in the Church, of their priuate aucthoritie: and against them which preacheth without licence, set furth the .vj. daie of Februarij, in the seconde yere of the Kynges Maiesties most gracious reigne
Proclamations. 1548-02-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni regij impressoris. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 152 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
